about: I am a Full-Stack Web Developer with 3+ years of experience designing and developing web applications. I specialize in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and Python, and I am passionate about creating intuitive and user-friendly interfaces. My goal is to continue learning and growing as a developer while contributing to innovative projects and making a positive impact in the tech industry.
